Package utils

Class MapParser

  • Object
    • utils.MapParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditMap
    public class MapParser
extends Object
    The Map Parser utility parses the whole map file from disk.

      • loadMap

        public static GameMap loadMap​(String fileName)
                       throws IOException,
                              Exception
        Loads the map file and parses it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the location of the map file to be parsed
        Returns:
        GameMap the parsed GameMap Object
        Throws:
        IOException - when file location/contents are invalid
        Exception - when map file doesn't contain all the required sections

      • deserializeCountry

        private static Country deserializeCountry​(String countryLine,
                                          ArrayList<String> continentNames)
        This deserializes the country line from the file into a Country object.
        Parameters:
        countryLine - the raw line from the file.
        continentNames - the names of all continents
        Returns:
        A continent object

      • deserializeContinent

        Returns:
        A continent object

      • deserializeBorder

        private static Map.Entry<String,​Set<String>> deserializeBorder​(String borderLine,
                                                                     ArrayList<String> countryNames)
        This deserializes the border line from the file into a Border object.
        Parameters:
        borderLine - the raw line from the file.
        countryNames - A list of country names.
        Returns:
        An entry object, key is the name and the value is a Set of borders.

        Parameters:

        formatted country line
